name: ephemerality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the quality or state of lasting only for a short time: I'm attracted to the fragility and ephemerality of these delicate flowers. I learned a lesson on the ephemerality of life.
[ C or U ] a thing that lasts only for a short time: These commodities were often regarded as simply ephemeralities. I see no point spending my life pursuing some ephemerality.
More examplesFewer examplesThe artist said that she was making a statement about the ephemerality of fashion. The ephemerality of music is part of its charm.Her career provides a useful illustration of the ephemerality of fame.The book transcends the usual ephemeralities of journalism.
